markdown:
<title level="1" right="Rules">[Dim Light](/Rules.aspx?ID=408)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 464 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Areas in shadow or lit by weak light sources are in dim light. Creatures and objects in dim light have the concealed condition, unless the seeker has darkvision or low-light vision (see Special Senses on page 465), or a precise sense other than vision.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Dim Light
search_markdown:
<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 464 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

Chapter 9: Playing the Game / General Rules / Perception / Light
</additional-info>
text: Dim Light Source Core Rulebook pg. 464 4.0 Areas in shadow or lit by weak light sources are in dim light. Creatures and objects in dim light have the concealed condition, unless the seeker has darkvision or low-light vision (see Special Senses on page 465), or a precise sense other than vision.
